column1: Local Foods////I so wanted to like this place
column2: great Yelp reviews and delicious looking pics
column3: but I just did not like most of what I sampled at all. Went here with three other girlfriends and was able to sample what everyone got. The crunchy chicken sandwich was a little bland and not anything I would come back for. The steak and egg sandwich had an odd sweet taste to the meat which I'm generally not opposed to but with the eggs it was not appealing. The only thing less appetizing was the quinoa burger with its horribly mush texture
column4: like eating mud. The only saving grace of the meal with the pretzel buns everything came on and the egg salad sandwich
column5: now that I would eat again.  Overall pretty disappointing.  I have no plans to return here.
